  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">11,549,042</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#cceeff" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.34%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="40%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:40.46%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Identifiable
  assets</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.74%;">
  <p style="font-size:1.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;">&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
  <td width="17%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:17.7%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">94,024,629</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.72%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="17%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:17.66%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">39,563,535</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.72%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="17%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:17.66%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">133,588,164</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.34%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Included in net sales for the United States are export sales, primarily
to Eastern Europe, Canada and the Caribbean, totaling approximately $6,300,000,
$6,400,000 and $6,400,000 for the years ended September&nbsp;30, 2003, 2002 and
2001.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .75in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.75in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Note
14.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Pension
Plan</p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .75in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.75in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Company has a defined contribution retirement plan which covers
substantially all United States employees.&#160;
Participants are immediately vested in any elective contributions and
related earnings, if any.&#160; Generally,
employer contributions to the plan begin to vest to the benefit of the
participant after three years of service.&#160;
Participants are entitled, upon retirement, to their vested portion of
the retirement fund assets.&#160; The Company
contributed approximately $967,962 $1,043,311 and $915,998 to the plan for the
years ended September&nbsp;30, 2003, 2002 and 2001, respectively.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .75in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.75in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Note
15.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Investment
in Premier Wines &amp; Spirits, Ltd.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .75in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.75in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In 1997, the Company acquired a 45% interest in Premier Wines &amp;
Spirits, Ltd., (&#147;Premier&#148;), a wholesale liquor distributor in the United States
Virgin Islands, for $450,000.&#160; This
investment is being accounted for using the equity method.&#160; The Company had sales to Premier of
approximately $2,344,603, $2,007,654 and $1,946,000 for the years ended
September&nbsp;30, 2003, 2002 and 2001, respectively.&#160; Included in trade receivables is approximately $343,009 and
$455,000 as of September&nbsp;30, 2003 and 2002, respectively, related to these
sales.&#160; The Company had outstanding
advances to Premier of $787,019 and $587,019 as of September&nbsp;30, 2003 and
2002, respectively, which are included in investments in and advances to equity
investees.&#160; These advances are unsecured
and bear interest at 6.0%.&#160; Interest
payments are due monthly or on demand in accordance with the terms of the
agreement.&#160; Principal is payable on
demand.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">44</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='44',FILE='C:\jms\sbalaji\03-6288-1\task56840\6288-1-be.htm',USER='SBALAJI',CD='Dec 17 13:29 2003' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .75in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.75in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Note
16.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Fair
Value of Financial Instruments</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The following methods and assumptions were used to estimate the fair
value of each class of financial instruments for which it is practicable to
estimate that value:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The carrying amounts approximate fair values as of September&nbsp;30,
2003 and 2002 for cash and cash equivalents, short-term investments, trade
receivables, other receivables and accounts payable because of the short-term
maturities of those instruments.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Notes receivable</font></u>:&#160; The fair value of the Company&#146;s notes receivable
has been determined based on available market information and management&#146;s
estimate of current market conditions of similar instruments.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Long-term debt</font></u>:&#160; The fair value of the Company&#146;s long-term
debt is estimated based on the current rates offered to the Company for debt of
the same remaining maturities with similar collateral requirements.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

 <tr>
  <td width="43%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:43.02%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Long-term
  debt</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
  <p style="font-size:1.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;">&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
  <td width="12%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:12.0%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">51,315,617</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

  <td width="12%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:12.0%;">

  <td width="0%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:.98%;">

 <tr height="0">
  <td width="310" style="border:none;"></td>
  <td width="14" style="border:none;"></td>
  <td width="9" style="border:none;"></td>
  <td width="77" style="border:none;"></td>

</table>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .75in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.75in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Note
17.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Net
Income Per Common Share</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Basic net income per common share is computed using the weighted
average number of common shares outstanding during the period.&#160; Diluted net income per share is computed
using the weighted average number of common and dilutive common equivalent
shares outstanding during the period.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:100.0%;">

  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Gross
  profit</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#cceeff" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
  <p style="font-size:1.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;">&nbsp;</p>
  </td>

  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7,691</font></p>
  </td>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">46</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='46',FILE='C:\jms\sbalaji\03-6288-1\task56840\6288-1-be.htm',USER='SBALAJI',CD='Dec 17 13:29 2003' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .75in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.75in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Note
19.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Legal
Proceedings</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The United States Virgin Islands Department of Public Works, Virgin
Islands Rum Industries, Ltd. (&#147;VIRIL&#148;), the Company&#146;s wholly-owned subsidiary,
and Cruzan Divers, Inc. (VIRIL&#146;s contractor) each received a Request for
Information (the &#147;I-R&#148;), dated June&nbsp;30, 2003, from the Environmental
Protection Agency (the &#147;EPA&#148;) concerning the construction, in the spring of
2002, of an effluent outfall line on the south shore of St. Croix.&#160; The I-R, which was issued pursuant to
Section&nbsp;308 of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act, 33 U.S.C. 1251, et
seq. (the &#147;FWPCA&#148;), stated that the EPA was investigating whether the
construction and installation of the outfall line constituted a violation of
Section&nbsp;404 of the FWPCA.&#160; The I-R
further stated that, depending on the outcome of the investigation, the EPA
might issue administrative orders for site restoration, assess civil
administrative penalties (up to a maximum of $137,500, according to the I-R),
or take other enforcement action.&#160; VIRIL
submitted a timely response to the I-R on August&nbsp;6, 2003.&#160; Since that time, VIRIL has heard nothing
further from the EPA concerning this matter.&#160;
At this time, management is not able to predict the outcome of the EPA&#146;s
investigation, including whether and to what extent the EPA may choose any of
its enforcement options.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco and Firearms of the United States
Department of the Treasury (the &#147;BATF&#148;) had advised the Company that it was
conducting an investigation of shipments made by various U.&nbsp;S. Alcohol
producers to certain countries formerly included in the Soviet Union.&#160; The BATF had indicated that it believed that
certain of the Company&#146;s export shipments may not have conformed to the specifications
required by the BATF, and that this nonconformity may have violated U.&nbsp;S.
law.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In June&nbsp;2002, the Company entered into agreements with the BATF
providing for the following: (1) the Company agreed to pay a total of $400,000
in taxes and forfeitures, which was paid in June&nbsp;2002; (2) the Company
agreed to a four-day suspension (which was served in July&nbsp;2002) of the
Company&#146;s federal basic permit at its Florida facilities; and (3) the BATF has
indicated that it will not seek any further actions against or penalties from
the Company with respect to the shipments in question.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Company believes that the outcome of the EPA investigation will not
have a material adverse effect on the Company&#146;s financial condition or results
of operation.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .75in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.75in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Note
20.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Retirement</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">During November&nbsp;2002, the Company announced the retirement of A.
Kenneth Pincourt, Jr., its Founder, Chairman and Chief Executive Officer.&#160; The Company has entered into an agreement
with Mr. Pincourt, setting forth the terms of his retirement.&#160; Under this agreement, the Company elected to
accelerate retirement benefits and continue to pay compensation and provide
related benefits through July&nbsp;15, 2004.&#160;
The Company recorded a charge for these items during the first quarter
of its 2003 fiscal year.&#160; The effect of
this charge, net of income tax benefits, was approximately $1 million or $.18
per common share.&#160; In addition, the
Company&#146;s majority shareholder, Angostura, Ltd., entered into an agreement with
Mr. Pincourt to purchase 595,985 shares of common stock and closed on this
transaction on January&nbsp;31, 2003.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">47</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='47',FILE='C:\jms\sbalaji\03-6288-1\task56840\6288-1-be.htm',USER='SBALAJI',CD='Dec 17 13:29 2003' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><a name="IndependentAuditors"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">INDEPENDENT AUDITOR&#146;S</font></b></a><b><font style="font-weight:bold;"> REPORT</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">ON
FINANCIAL STATEMENT SCHEDULE</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">To the Board of Directors</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Todhunter International, Inc.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">West Palm Beach, Florida</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Our audits were made for the purpose of forming an opinion on the basic
consolidated financial statements taken as a whole.&#160; The consolidated financial statements Schedule&nbsp;II for the
years ended September&nbsp;30, 2003, 2002, and 2001 is presented for purposes
of complying with the Securities and Exchange Commission&#146;s rules and is not a
part of the basic consolidated financial statements.&#160; This schedule&nbsp;has been subjected to the auditing procedures
applied in our audits of the basic consolidated financial statements and, in
our opinion, is fairly stated in all material respects in relation to the basic
consolidated financial statements taken as a whole.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">413,546</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.46%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.3%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="13%" valign="bottom" style="border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;border-left:none;border-right:none;border-top:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:13.54%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">723,007</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.06%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">49</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

  <td width="8%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:8.78%;">
  <p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">31.2</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.7%;">
  <p style="color:black;font-size:1.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;">&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
  <td width="88%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:88.52%;">
  <p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Certification of Ezra Shashoua, Executive Vice President
  and Chief Financial Officer, pursuant to Rule 13a-14(a) of the Securities
  Exchange Act of 1934 (11)</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="8%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:8.78%;">
  <p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">32.1</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.7%;">
  <p style="color:black;font-size:1.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;">&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
  <td width="88%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:88.52%;">
  <p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Certification of Jay S. Maltby, Chairman, Chief Executive
  Officer and President, pursuant to 18 U.S.C. Section&nbsp;1350 (11)</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="8%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:8.78%;">
  <p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">32.2</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.7%;">
  <p style="color:black;font-size:1.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;">&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
  <td width="88%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:88.52%;">
  <p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Certification of Ezra Shashoua, Executive Vice President
  and Chief Financial Officer, pursuant to 18 U.S.C. Section&nbsp;1350 (11)</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="1" width="25%" noshade color="black" align="left">

</font></div>


<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">+</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Indicates
management contracts or compensatory plans or arrangements required to be filed
as an exhibit.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(1)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Incorporated
herein by reference to the Company&#146;s Registration Statement on Form&nbsp;S-1
(File No.&nbsp;33-50848).</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(2)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Incorporated
herein by reference to the Company&#146;s Annual Report on Form&nbsp;10-K for the
year ended September&nbsp;30, 1995.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(3)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Incorporated
herein by reference to the Company&#146;s Annual Report on Form 10-K for the year
ended September&nbsp;30, 1997.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(4)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Incorporated
herein by reference to the Company&#146;s Annual Report on Form 10-K for the year
ended September&nbsp;30, 1998.</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">50</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(5)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Incorporated

November&nbsp;17, 1999.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(6)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Incorporated
herein by reference to the Company&#146;s Annual Report on Form 10-K for the year
ended September&nbsp;30, 1999.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(7)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Incorporated

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(8)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Incorporated

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(9)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Incorporated

<head>



</head>

<body>

<div style="font-family:'Times New Roman';">

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Exhibit 10.24</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">AMENDED AND RESTATED</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">EXECUTIVE
EMPLOYMENT AGREEMENT</font></u></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">THIS AMENDED AND RESTATED EXECUTIVE EMPLOYMENT
AGREEMENT (this &#147;Agreement&#148;) is made this 17th day of June, 2003, between
Todhunter International, Inc., a Delaware corporation (&#147;Employer&#148;), and Thomas
A. Valdes (&#147;Executive&#148;).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The original Executive
Employment Agreement between Employer and Executive was entered into as of
July&nbsp;15, 1999.&#160; Employer and
Executive desire to amend and restate the Executive Employment Agreement in
accordance with the terms and conditions set forth in this Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The parties hereto, in consideration of the mutual
covenants contained herein, agree upon the following terms of employment of
Executive by Employer:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Employment
and Term</u>.&#160; Subject to the terms and
conditions herein, Employer hereby employs Executive and Executive hereby
accepts employment for a&#160; term
commencing on the date hereof and ending at the close of business on
September&nbsp;30, 2008 (the &#147;Employment Period&#148;), unless sooner terminated as
hereinafter provided.&#160; The Employment
Period shall continue automatically for additional periods of one (1) year each
under the same terms and conditions unless either party shall have given
written notice of termination at least ninety (90) days before the end of the
then current term.&#160; All references
herein to the Employment Period shall refer to both the initial Employment
Period and any such successive Employment Periods.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Duties</u>.&#160; Executive shall serve as Executive Vice
President of the Employer.&#160; Executive
shall perform the duties generally of a Executive Vice President for Employer
and shall have such specific responsibilities, duties and authorities as shall
from time to time be assigned by the Chief Executive Officer or the Board of
Directors of Employer (&#147;Board of Directors&#148;).&#160;&#160;
Executive shall devote substantially all of his working time and efforts
to the business and affairs of Employer and its subsidiaries.&#160; Executive shall not be required to relocate
his office or residence outside of Palm Beach County, Florida.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Compensation</u>.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Salary</u>.&#160; For all duties to be performed by Executive
in any capacity hereunder, Executive shall be paid an annual salary (the &#147;Base
Salary&#148;) at a rate determined by the Board of Directors of not less than
$287,804 per year payable monthly or in such more frequent installments as
Employer customarily pays its other executives.&#160; The Board of Directors may authorize upward compensation
adjustments by way of salary, bonus or otherwise, as it deems appropriate
during the Employment Period or any extension hereof.&#160; The Base Salary, as amended and determined herein from time to
time, shall constitute &#147;Base Salary&#148; for purposes of this Agreement.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">B.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Bonus</u>.&#160; In addition to the Base Salary, Employer
shall pay Executive within sixty (60) days after the end of each fiscal year
(including any partial fiscal year) of Employer which occurs during the
Employment Period a cash bonus (the &#147;Base Bonus&#148;) in an amount determined by
the Board of Directors but in no event less than $92,610 per year (prorated for
any partial fiscal year).&#160; The amount of
the bonus may exceed such amount to the extent earned in accordance with
performance targets, measurements and such other criteria as shall be
established for such fiscal year by the Board of Directors.&#160; The Base Bonus, as</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='',FILE='C:\jms\kthiaga\03-6288-1\task56250\6288-1-ke.htm',USER='bkesarla',CD='Dec 16 18:17 2003' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">amended and determined herein from time to time, shall constitute &#147;Base
Bonus&#148; for purposes of this Agreement.&#160;
If this Agreement is terminated prior to the end of a fiscal year for
any reason, except as set forth in 4(C) or 4(E)(4), the amount of bonus shall
be prorated for the number of days elapsed in such fiscal year prior to the
date of termination.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">C.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Vacation</u>.&#160; Executive shall be entitled each year to a
reasonable period of paid vacation.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">D.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Fringe
Benefits</u>.&#160; Executive shall be
entitled to participate in or receive benefits under any employee benefit plan,
program or arrangement made available by Employer or its subsidiaries in the
future to its executives and key management employees, subject to and on a
basis consistent with the terms, conditions and overall administration of such
plans and arrangements.&#160; If and to the extent that any benefit is not
or cannot be paid or provided under any plan, program, or arrangement of
Employer, then Employer will itself pay or provide for the payment to Executive
and Executive&#146;s dependents and beneficiaries, of such benefits along with, in
the case of any benefit described in this Section&nbsp;3(D) which is subject to
tax because it is not or cannot be paid or provided under any such plan,
program or arrangement of Employer, an additional amount such that after
payment by Executive and Executive&#146;s dependents or beneficiaries, as the case
may be, of all taxes so imposed, the recipient retains an amount equal to such
taxes.&#160; Notwithstanding the foregoing,
and subject to Section&nbsp;4(G) and 5(B) hereof, for purposes of determining
the period of continuation coverage to which Executive or any of Executive&#146;s
dependents is entitled to pursuant to Section&nbsp;4980B of the Internal
Revenue Code of 1986, as amended, under Employer&#146;s medical, dental, and other
group health plans, or successor plans, Executive&#146;s &#147;qualifying event&#148; shall be
his Date of Termination and Executive shall be considered to have remained
actively employed on a full-time basis through that date.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">E.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Expenses</u>.&#160; It is understood that Executive will from
time to time incur reasonable expenses in conjunction with his employment.&#160; Employer will promptly reimburse him for any
such expenses of which he shall present a signed itemized written account
setting forth the amount and nature of each such expenditure, and in addition,
with respect to travel or entertainment, the business purpose, the nature of
discussions and other person or persons involved and such other information as
Employer may reasonably require; provided that such expenses are incurred and
accounted for in accordance with such other policies and procedures then
established by Employer.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">F.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>D&amp;O
Coverage</u>.&#160; If immediately prior to
Executive&#146;s Date of Termination Executive was covered as an insured under
Employer&#146;s D&amp;O Insurance, Employer will be obligated to continue
Executive&#146;s coverage under Employer&#146;s D&amp;O Insurance or provide Executive
with similar coverage, in either case, on substantially the same terms and
conditions until the third anniversary of the date of Executive&#146;s Date of
Termination.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Termination</u>.&#160; Unless otherwise&#160; agreed to in writing by Employer and Executive, Executive&#146;s
employment hereunder may be terminated under the following circumstances, in
addition to terminations pursuant to Section&nbsp;5 hereof:</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Death</u>.&#160; Executive&#146;s death.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">B.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Disability</u>.&#160; If, as a result of Executive&#146;s incapacity
due to physical or mental illness (such incapacity being determined by the
Board of Directors in its sole reasonable discretion), Executive shall have
been absent from his full-time duties as described hereunder</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='2',FILE='C:\jms\kthiaga\03-6288-1\task56250\6288-1-ke.htm',USER='bkesarla',CD='Dec 16 18:17 2003' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">for the entire period of six (6) consecutive months, Employer may
terminate Executive&#146;s employment hereunder.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">C.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Cause</u>.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">i.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Employer
may terminate Executive&#146;s employment hereunder for Cause.&#160; For purposes of this Agreement, &#147;Cause&#148;
shall mean that (a) Executive is convicted of a felony which, in the sole
determination of the Board of Directors, would have a material adverse effect
on Executive&#146;s ability to perform his duties hereunder or on the business or
reputation of Employer; (b) Executive has exhibited gross misconduct resulting
in material harm to Employer, its business or reputation; (c) Executive has
willfully misappropriated Employer assets or has otherwise willfully defrauded
Employer, including without limitation by fraud, theft, embezzlement, or breach
of a fiduciary duty involving personal profit; (d) Executive has intentionally
failed to perform his duties hereunder; or (e) Executive has breached any
provision of this Agreement.&#160; For the
purposes of this Section&nbsp;4(C)(i), no act or failure to act on Executive&#146;s
part shall be considered &#147;willful&#148; unless done, or omitted to be done, by him
not in good faith and without reasonable belief that his action or omission was
in the best interests of Employer.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ii.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Notwithstanding
the foregoing, any termination of Executive shall not be considered a
termination for Cause pursuant to this Section&nbsp;4, and shall be considered
a termination Without Cause pursuant to Section&nbsp;4(D) hereof, if such
termination is effected without:&#160; (a)
reasonable notice to Executive setting forth the reasons for Employer&#146;s
intention to terminate for Cause; (b) an opportunity for Executive, together
with his counsel, to be heard before the Board of Directors; and (c) delivery
to Executive of a Notice of Termination as provided for in Section&nbsp;4(I)
hereof from the Board of Directors finding that in the good faith opinion of
the Board of Directors, Executive was guilty of conduct set forth above in the
preceding sentence, and specifying the particulars thereof in detail.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">D.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Without
Cause</u>.&#160; Any termination of Executive
by Employer (including any action which is deemed a termination of Executive
pursuant to Section&nbsp;4(F) hereof), other than a termination pursuant to
Sections 1 and 4(A)-4(C) hereof, shall be deemed a termination Without Cause.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">E.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Termination
by Executive</u>.&#160; Executive may
terminate this Agreement (1) due to Executive&#146;s retirement; provided that
Executive provides Employer with thirty (30) days written notice, pursuant to
Section&nbsp;4(I), prior to the effective date of such retirement, as shall be
stated in such notice; (2) for reasons
set forth in Section&nbsp;4(F)(iii), (iv) and (v), provided, however, that
Executive provides Employer with ten (10) days written notice pursuant to
Section&nbsp;4(I); (3) as provided in Section&nbsp;1; and (4) for any other
reason other than Executive&#146;s retirement, provided that Executive provides
Employer with thirty (30) days written notice prior to the effective date of
such termination, as shall be stated in such notice.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">F.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Other
Events of Termination</u>.&#160; The
following circumstances shall specifically be deemed a termination Without
Cause of Executive&#146;s employment by Employer:</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">i.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>a
vote by the Board of Directors to terminate Executive Without Cause, as defined
in Section&nbsp;4(D) hereof;</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ii.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>any
termination of Executive&#146;s employment which is not effected pursuant to a
Notice of Termination satisfying the requirements of Section&nbsp;4(I) hereof;</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='3',FILE='C:\jms\kthiaga\03-6288-1\task56250\6288-1-ke.htm',USER='bkesarla',CD='Dec 16 18:17 2003' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;">&nbsp;</p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">iii.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>a
breach by Employer of this Agreement, and a subsequent election by Executive to
terminate this Agreement pursuant to Section&nbsp;4(E) above;</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">iv.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>the
performance of any other act by Employer which is designed to prevent and does
prevent Executive from properly performing the authorities, duties and
responsibilities of his employment hereunder; or</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">v.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Executive
voluntarily terminates his employment for &#147;Good Reason.&#148;&#160; Good Reason shall mean (a) any material
diminution by Executive&#146;s supervisor or the Board of Directors, as the case may
be, of Executive&#146;s position, duties, or responsibilities; (b) any reduction in
Executive&#146;s salary or Executive&#146;s benefits described in Section&nbsp;3(D),
other than a reduction affecting all executive officers; or (c) the relocation
of Employer&#146;s headquarters outside of Palm Beach County, Florida.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">G.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Payments
if Without Cause or for Good Reason</u>.&#160;
If Executive&#146;s employment is terminated for any reason pursuant to
Section&nbsp;4(D) or 4(E)(2) hereof, Employer shall continue to pay Executive
his then Base Salary and then Base Bonus in accordance with and at such times
specified in Sections 3(A) and 3(B) and provide the benefits pursuant to
Section&nbsp;3(D) for the greater of: (1) one (1) year from the Date of
Termination, or (2) the balance of the Employment Period (the then Base Bonus
to be prorated for any partial fiscal year).&#160;
In addition, the vesting schedules, if any, under all stock options held
by Executive shall continue to run to the maximum extent permitted by
applicable law.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">H.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Payments
Under Other Terminations</u>.&#160; If
Executive&#146;s employment is terminated pursuant to Sections 1, 4(A), 4(B), 4(C),
4(E)(1) or 4(E)(4) hereof, on and after the Date of Termination Employer shall
no longer be obligated to pay Executive any amounts payable hereunder for such
period, whether in the form of Base Salary, Base Bonus or otherwise, and
Executive shall have no right to compensation or other benefits hereunder for
any such period.&#160; Notwithstanding the
foregoing, Employer shall be obligated to pay to Executive all amounts payable
hereunder and otherwise, through and including the Date of Termination, whether
such amounts were payable prior to the date of termination or thereafter, and
Executive shall be entitled to receive any extension of benefits beyond the
Date of Termination, provided that (1) such benefits were received by Executive
prior to the Date of Termination and (2) such extension is customarily offered
by Employer to its employees or is otherwise required by applicable law.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Notice
of Termination</u>.&#160; Any termination of
Executive&#146;s employment by Employer or by Executive (other than termination
pursuant to Section&nbsp;4(A) hereof) shall be communicated by written Notice
of Termination to the other party hereto.&#160;
For purposes of this Agreement, a &#147;Notice of Termination&#148; shall mean a
notice which shall (1) indicate the specific termination provision in this
Agreement relied upon; (2) set forth in reasonable detail the facts and circumstances
claimed to provide a basis for termination of Executive&#146;s employment under the
provision so indicated; and (3) contain any other information required by this
Agreement.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">J.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Effective
Date of Termination</u>.&#160; For purposes
of Section&nbsp;3(F) and this Section&nbsp;4, &#147;Date of Termination&#148; shall mean:
(1) if Executive&#146;s employment is terminated by providing written notice of
termination pursuant to Section&nbsp;1 hereof, as of September&nbsp;30, 2008,
or the September&nbsp;30 immediately subsequent to the provision of such written
notice of termination if such notice is provided after September&nbsp;30, 2008;
(2) if Executive&#146;s employment is terminated by his death, the date of his
death; (3) if Executive&#146;s employment is terminated pursuant to
Section&nbsp;4(B) hereof, the termination date stated in the written notice
sent by</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='4',FILE='C:\jms\kthiaga\03-6288-1\task56250\6288-1-ke.htm',USER='bkesarla',CD='Dec 16 18:17 2003' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Employer after the expiration of six (6) consecutive months of
Executive&#146;s incapacity due to physical or mental illness, as set forth in
Section&nbsp;4(B) hereof (provided that Executive shall not have returned to
the performance of his duties on a full-time basis during such six (6) month
period); (4) if Executive&#146;s employment is terminated pursuant to Sections 4(C)
or 4(D) hereof, the effective date of termination specified in the Notice of
Termination is communicated to Executive pursuant to Section&nbsp;4(I) hereof;
(5) if Executive&#146;s employment is terminated pursuant to Section&nbsp;4(E)
hereof, the effective termination date stated in the written notice received by
Employer; or (6) if deemed terminated pursuant to Section&nbsp;4(F) hereof, the
date of such action which is deemed a termination of Executive by Employer.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Termination
of Employment Upon Change of Control</u>.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Certain
Definitions</u>.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">i.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;Change
of Control&#148; shall mean:</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:2.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The
acquisition by any person, entity or &#147;group&#148; required to file a
Schedule&nbsp;13D or Schedule&nbsp;14D-1 promulgated under the Securities
Exchange Act of 1934, as amended (the &#147;Exchange Act&#148;) (excluding, for this
purpose, any of the following that acquires beneficial ownership of voting
securities of Employer, including shares acquired pursuant to the exercise of
options or warrants, or conversion of preferred stock outstanding as of the
date hereof: (i) CL Financial, Ltd., Angostura Ltd., or any of their affiliates;
(ii) Employer, its affiliates or subsidiaries; (iii) V&amp;S Vin &amp; Spirit
AB, its affiliates or subsidiaries, solely in connection with a transaction
with Employer, its affiliates or subsidiaries approved by the Board of
Directors; or (iv) any employee benefit plan of Employer, or its affiliates or
subsidiaries), of beneficial ownership (within the meaning of Rule 13d-3
promulgated under the Exchange Act) of over 40% (in one or more transactions,
in the aggregate) of either the then outstanding shares of common stock or the
combined voting power of Employer&#146;s then outstanding voting securities entitled
to vote generally in the election of directors; or</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:2.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:2.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>An
election or appointment to the Board of Directors by virtue of which the
individuals who immediately prior thereto constituted the Board of Directors
(the &#147;Incumbent Board&#148;) no longer constitute at least a majority of the Board
of Directors (other than an election or appointment of a director or directors
precipitated by CL Financial, Ltd., Angostura Ltd., V&amp;S Vin &amp; Spirit
AB, or any of their affiliates, or by the Board of Directors if at that time at
least a majority are individuals who are directors on the date hereof),
provided that any person who becomes a director subsequent to the date hereof
whose election, or nomination for election by Employer&#146;s stockholders, was
approved by a vote of at least a majority of the Incumbent Board (other than an
election or nomination of an individual whose initial assumption of office is
in connection with an actual or threatened election contest relating to the
election of the Directors of Employer, as such terms are used in Rule 14a-1
promulgated under the Exchange Act) shall be, for purposes of this Agreement,
considered as though such person were a member of the Incumbent Board; or</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:2.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:2.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Approval
by the stockholders of Employer of: (i) a reorganization, merger or
consolidation by reason of which persons who were the stockholders of Employer
immediately prior to such reorganization, merger or consolidation do not,
immediately thereafter, own more than fifty percent (50%) of the combined
voting power entitled to vote generally in the election of directors of the
reorganized, merged or consolidated company&#146;s then outstanding voting
securities; or (ii) a liquidation or dissolution of Employer or the sale of all
or substantially all of the assets of Employer, whether such assets are held</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='5',FILE='C:\jms\kthiaga\03-6288-1\task56250\6288-1-ke.htm',USER='bkesarla',CD='Dec 16 18:17 2003' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">directly or indirectly (excluding the currently proposed joint ventures
with affiliates of CL Financial, Ltd. and/or V&amp;S Vin &amp; Spirit AB, if
such transactions constitute a sale of substantially all of the assets of
Employer).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ii.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;Date
of Termination,&#148; for the purposes of this Section&nbsp;5, means the date of
receipt by Executive of a notice of termination of employment from Employer or
any later date specified therein, or the date Executive delivers a letter of
resignation to Employer.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">iii.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The
&#147;Effective Date&#148; shall be the date on which a Change of Control occurs.&#160; Anything in this Agreement to the contrary
notwithstanding, if Executive&#146;s employment with Employer is terminated prior to
the date on which a Change of Control occurs, and it is reasonably demonstrated
that such termination (a) was at the request of a third party who has taken
steps reasonably calculated to effect a Change of Control or (b) otherwise
arose in connection with or anticipation of a Change of Control, then for all
purposes of this Agreement the &#147;Effective Date&#148; shall mean the date immediately
prior to the date of such termination.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">B.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Obligations
of Employer upon Termination</u>.&#160; If
within one (1) year following the Effective Date of a Change of Control,
Executive&#146;s employment is deemed terminated Without Cause within the two-year
period immediately preceding the end of the Employment Period, then in addition
to any amount payable under Section&nbsp;4(G), Employer shall pay to Executive
in a lump sum in cash within thirty (30) days after the Date of Termination to
the extent not theretofore paid, an amount equal to (i) two times Executive&#146;s
then Base Salary, two times the then Base Bonus, and the benefits provided
pursuant to Section&nbsp;3(D), less (ii) the amount payable under
